item.title: astro891
item.description: Seminar on Cosmology - astro891 Course Seminar on Cosmology Course No. astro891 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Seminar English 2 4 WT/ST Requirements: Preparation: astro812 (Cosmology) Form of Testing and Examination: Talk Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: The students will be introduced to the newest state of knowledge in cosmology.

item.title: astro892
item.description: Seminar on Radio Astronomy - astro892 Course Seminar on Radio Astronomy Course No. astro892 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Seminar English 2 4 WT/ST Requirements: Preparation: astro841 (Radio Astronomy: Tools, Applications, Impacts) Form of Testing and Examination: Talk Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: The participating students will learn in depth how the radio-astronomical tools can be utilized in practice to scrutinize a wide range of astrophysical phenomena.

item.title: astro893
item.description: Seminar on Stellar Systems: “Star Clusters and Dwarf Galaxies'' - astro893 Course Seminar on Stellar Systems: "Star Clusters and Dwarf Galaxies'' Course No. astro893 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Seminar English 2 4 WT/ST Requirements: Preparation: astro811 (Stars and Stellar Evolution), astro821 (Astrophysics of Galaxies) Form of Testing and Examination: Talk Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: The students will be introduced to the newest state of knowledge in the field of Star Clusters.
